54.desc: Employer's account number / Numéro de compte de l'employeur

14.desc: Employment income - total earnings for the year (salary, wages, bonuses)

16.desc: Employee's CPP contributions - Canada Pension Plan contributions deducted

16A.desc: Employee's second CPP contributions - additional CPP for higher earners

17.desc: Employee's QPP contributions - Quebec Pension Plan contributions (Quebec only)

17A.desc: Employee's second QPP contributions - additional QPP for higher earners

18.desc: Employee's EI premiums - Employment Insurance premiums deducted

20.desc: RPP contributions - Registered Pension Plan contributions

22.desc: Income tax deducted - federal and provincial/territorial income tax

24.desc: EI insurable earnings - Employment Insurance insurable earnings

26.desc: CPP/QPP pensionable earnings - Canada/Quebec Pension Plan pensionable earnings

29.desc: Employment code - code indicating type of employment

34.desc: Travel in a prescribed zone - taxable travel benefits in prescribed zones

38.desc: Pension adjustment - reduces RRSP contribution room

40.desc: Other taxable allowances and benefits - various taxable benefits

44.desc: Union dues - employee union dues deducted

45.desc: Number of T4 slips issued - count of T4s for this employee

46.desc: Charitable donations - donations made through employer

50.desc: RPP or DPSP registration number - pension plan registration number

52.desc: Pension adjustment - total pension adjustment amount

55.desc: Employee's PRPP premiums - Pooled Registered Pension Plan premiums

56.desc: PRPP insurable earnings - Pooled Registered Pension Plan insurable earnings
